item.title: Better Bash Scripting
Monitorizar Red Bash
item.description: #!/bin/bash LOG=/tmp/mylog.log SECONDS=3600 EMAIL=mi@email for i in $@ ;do echo "$i-UP!" > $LOG.$i done while true; do for i in $@; do ping -c 1 $i > /dev/null if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then STATUS=$(cat $LOG.$i) if [ $STATUS != "$i-DOWN!" ]; then echo "`date`: ping failed, $ihost is down!" | mail -s "$ihost is down!" $EMAIL fi else STATUS=$(cat $LOG.$i) if [ $STATUS !
